Title: What is Vikings LB Eric Wilson's value in free agency? It's hard to say
Description: Wilson is set to be a free agent this offseason and PFF did not predict a large contract. The outlet tabbed Wilson to earn two-years, $6 million ($3M APY) with $2.5 million total guaranteed. Here’s what the outlet wrote about Wilson: “Wilson has a solid 2020 in coverage,
Author: USA Today on MSN.com
